subject: Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Kings goalie Jonathan Quick saved 17 of 18 shots against the Devils in Game 1, denying Zach Parise early in the third period and David Clarkson later.
snippet: Kings goalie Jonathan Quick saved 17 of 18 shots against the Devils in Game 1, denying Zach Parise early in the third period and David Clarkson later.
